0: I spent almost 2 years every week living in the hotel since the first moment I felt a warm welcome from the reception team
Great service by the staff especially Mr Jean who was serving us breakfast every day
The service people specially mentioned Jean did a great job
Really great location peaceful Area close to lots of restaurants easy to get to the River Rhine friendly and helpful staff
Jean was very kind and he made sure that we received the best service every day
The service was very good room very comfortable and above all service from Jean at the restaurant was outstanding
1: The reception staff had no idea how to do billing and were so confused for a very straightforward booking and cc payment and took literally 30 mins to finally finish the checkout
Food options are really limited for room service for diverse group
Spent most of the night talking to the staff to change the room
Was able to extend my check out time till 6 pm whoever that staff was should get extra credit

The temp would not drop to the extent that we complained only to have the person at the pool reception bring us some flimzy fan which ended up blowing the warm air around the room and drying out our eyes
Service at the restaurant bar was poor
We had picked up a walking tours booklet from the Information desk at the airport

We travelled with friends who received a bigger room than us with a bath whereas we had an inner courtroom view with no room for 2 people in the bathroom our safe did not work even after we reported it to reception our bags could not be easily located after we had left them for a few hours after check out
Especially the restaurant staff must say that they are a fantastic bunch
